Adjust the M65 RGB ULTRA WIRELESS’ center of gravity and weight from 110g-128g using up to six included weights.

products.description: Multi-Device Connectivity with Easy Switching：Connect effortlessly with our wireless mouse that supports 2* Bluetooth connections and 2.4G wireless connection, which can link up to three devices—such as laptops, tablets, and smartphones—simultaneously. Easily switch between devices, making this mouse an adaptable companion for various tech environments. It is compatible with Windows, macOS, Chrome OS, and Android.     Effortless Navigation：Designed for convenience, this ergonomic mouse features a 4-way scroll wheel that enables smooth navigation in all directions. Coupled with dedicated forward and back buttons, you can browse through documents and web pages with enhanced efficiency, making your workflow more fluid.     Long-lasting Rechargeable Battery：The mouse is powered by a durable 650mAh rechargeable battery, providing up to 90 days(Without RGB light on) of usage on a single charge. The Type-C charging port allows for a quick and easy recharge in just 2 hours, ensuring that you stay productive without interruptions.     Stylish Feature & Quiet Operation: The dynamic RGB lighting at the tail that adds an attractive aesthetic to your setup. The silent clicking technology significantly reduces noise, providing a quiet workspace conducive to concentration and focus.     Ergonomic Design: Constructed from high-quality materials, this bluetooth mouse offers exceptional durability and longevity. The matte finish promotes a non-slip grip and an ergonomic fit that conforms to the natural contours of the hand, reducing strain on the wrist and fingers and making it suitable for prolonged periods of use.

products.description: ⭐【Multi-Device Wireless Bluetooth Mouse】Rapoo MT760 supports bluetooth 5.0/3.0 and 2.4GHz tri-mode connection, which can be used to switch back and forth between office computer/laptop/cell phone/ipad via bluetooth or the included USB dongle, and the low-power, low-latency, and high-efficiency bluetooth wireless mouse allows you to face all kinds of complicated matters with ease.     ⭐【7 Adjustable DPI & M+ Cross-Computer Technology】Rapoo wireless mouse preset 800/1000/1200/1600/2400/3200/4000 seven DPI value, through the DPI button a key to adjust to meet different personal use needs. Ergonomic bow-back design, thumb support, anti-slip and anti-sweat, full support, comfort and ease of use. Fits all grips and hand sizes, especially for people with bigger hands.     ⭐【11 Programmable Buttons & Wireless Charging Enabled】Assign shortcuts, media keys, or macros to streamline your work and boost efficiency.Works with most Qi wireless charging mouse pads, enjoy an effortless power boost while at use, and embrace the convenience of cord-free charging.
